Plot: It's been two years since Conrad told Belly to go with Jeremiah. She and Jeremiah have been inseparable ever since, even attending the same collegeâ€”only, their relationship hasn't exactly been the happily ever after Belly had hoped it would be. And when Jeremiah makes the worst mistake a boy can make, Belly is forced to question what she thought was true love. Does she really have a future with Jeremiah? Has she ever gotten over Conrad? It's time for Belly to decide, once and for all, who has her heart forever.
Characters: Jeremiah Fisher, Conrad Fisher, Isabel "Belly" Conklin
Setting: Cousins Beach, North Carolina (United States), North Carolina (United States)
